message: Accept this offer and we can split the money fairly. If not, I'll make a new offer next round.
Take it or leave it, I'm not budging from 50/50
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more than 40%. Think about it.
You're getting closer, but I'm not going to give you the majority. Try again next round!
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I still think I deserve a bit more. This is my best offer so far.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about splitting it fairly. This is my last generous offer, take it or leave it!
I'm not going to back down. I deserve a bigger share, and I'm willing to take the risk of going to the final round to get it.
You're being greedy, Alice. This is my last chance to get a decent share. Take it or leave it, but don't say I didn't warn you!
This is my final offer. I'm not going to negotiate further. Take it or leave it, but I'm not going to be taken advantage of.
You're really going to regret this, Alice. I'm taking what's rightfully mine, and you're getting a tiny fraction. Don't say I didn't warn you!
I'm not going to get any more than this. I'm willing to settle for a 50/50 split, but I'm not optimistic about it.
